scripts.test: mkdir -p build/contracts && cp node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/build/contracts/* build/contracts/ && truffle test
scripts.migrate: mkdir -p build/contracts && cp node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/build/contracts/* build/contracts/ && npm run migrate-eth && npm run migrate-bsc
scripts.register: truffle exec scripts/register_bsc_chain.js && truffle exec scripts/register_eth_chain.js --network development2
scripts.mint: truffle exec scripts/mint_eth_chain.js && truffle exec scripts/mint_bsc_chain.js --network development2
